mapper.insert: INSERT INTO htmlinfo ( id, title, imageUrl, htmlId, content, ipInfo, viewTimes, shareTimes, goodTimes, notGoodTimes, auditStatus, remark, createDate, creator, updateDate, updator ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{htmlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ipInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{viewTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shareTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{goodTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{notGoodTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
